scripts.build: npm run build:compile && npm run build:copy
scripts.build:compile: browserify src/app.js src/controller.js src/helpers.js src/item.js src/store.js src/template.js src/view.js src/zipkinjs/recorder.js -o dist/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.build:copy: shx cp index.html dist/index.html && shx cp node_modules/todomvc-common/base.js dist/base.js && shx cp node_modules/todomvc-common/base.css dist/base.css && shx cp node_modules/todomvc-app-css/index.css dist/index.css
